fields.question: How long will it take for my order to dispatch?
fields.answer: If you have chosen an immediate item, we will aim to dispatch your order within 1-4 working days.  If you have chosen a future dated delivery date we will aim to delivery within 7 working days of the chosen date.

fields.question: What are your payment terms?
fields.answer: Payment terms are pro-forma in most cases, we accept card payments at point of order.

fields.question: What assets do you provide for marketing Hobo & Hatch?
fields.answer: We have a vast array of quality product and lifestyle images which you will have access to once if you are a Hobo & Hatch stockist.

fields.question: What is the minimum order value?
How much does delivery cost?
fields.answer: For orders within the UK, standard delivery is £15.  Please contact us for a delivery quote if you are outside the UK.
